author: bmwlego
title: Now You Can Drink From LEGO too!
review: Cute cups I received as a gift from Lou for Christmas. 4 cups make up the set and they hold enough liquid refreshment to accompany a snack but not enough for a meal. A child would be able to drink from these cups and would love doing so. These cups fit right in with my McDonald's glasses from 1977 and all of the souvenir cups I have bought from different baseball parks up and down the East Coast. Thank you Louann!
